content:
Certainly! Here are three more Magic the Gathering cards, described in the same format as the previous card:

Card Name: Sol Ring

Mana Cost: 1

Card Type: Artifact

Card Text: T: Add 2 mana of any one color to your mana pool.

Rarity: Uncommon

---

Card Name: Time Walk

Mana Cost: 1U

Card Type: Sorcery

Card Text: Take an extra turn after this one.

Rarity: Rare

---

Card Name: Mox Sapphire

Mana Cost: 0

Card Type: Artifact

Card Text: T: Add one blue mana to your mana pool.

Rarity: Rare

I hope these descriptions are helpful! Please let me know if you have any further questions.
